DataElement.preferredDefinition: The reason the tumor assessment using Immune Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (iRECIST) was stopped.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Domain Assessment Discontinue Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A modification of the Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST), version 1.1, for use as a standard approach to solid tumor measurements and definitions for objective change in tumor size in cancer clinical trials in which an immunotherapy is used._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._To stop or end, permanently or temporarily._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: iRECIST Confirmed Progressive Disease Never Occurrence

ValueMeaning.preferredName: iRECIST Confirmed Progressive Disease Never Occurrence
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Radiographic progression which has been confirmed by additional imaging showing worsening of initial progression.: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Radiographic progression which has been confirmed by additional imaging showing worsening of initial progression.
Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.: Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

Concepts.definition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A type of study protocol designed to evaluate intervention(s) for disease treatment.: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

Concepts.definition: A type of study protocol designed to evaluate intervention(s) for disease treatment.
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
